Name: Asian Pear Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Sake and pear with sour complexity.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Asian Pear Cocktail contains 127 calories
